overview: Dennis Syracuse is a marketing and analytics industry veteran whose esteemed career has spanned over 20 years and whose experience includes senior management roles in global marketing and brand strategy. In his role as chief marketing officer for Datran Media, Syracuse has been charged with establishing a marketing analytics consulting practice, which provides professional consulting services to agencies. Prior to joining Datran Media, Syracuse served as senior vice president for Sony Electronics where he successfully and profitably led retail operations and merchandising across 65 SonyStyle store properties. Previous leadership experience includes marketing consulting roles across top brand and luxury retailers. Syracuse’s strengths lie in his ability to implement strategies that enlarge market share and significantly increase revenues while reducing costs and increasing operational efficiencies. Syracuse is a frequent recipient of business awards for marketing, sales and leadership and is a highly regarded industry spokesperson.
